name: alias
title: Alias Maker
desc: Alias Maker is an extension that creates aliases for your phrases. For example, the complex command `@cmd cd * && git describe --long --abbrev=7 --tags | sed 's/\([^-]*-g\)/r\1/;s/-/./g'` could be replaced with `Describe a repository for me *`. Note that the asterisk is used to replace the changing content.
